context.title: Cloud, What is Next
context.description: The first post of a series looking into what you should start thinking about now that you have made it to the cloud.

post.title: Cloud, What is Next
post.excerpt: We will be looking into the cloud and if you weren’t thinking about these concepts during your migration should be something you start talking about. The topics that will be presented all deserve their own post, and will get one, this is just to get you to start thinking about where you are and what the migration means for you.
